name: Foolish sunday
description:
This game is was made for fun in like 2021.

The original project is by SquigglyTuff  and I just remixed his game :)

If you wanna see how it was made well you can't... but here's the original project by SquigglyTuff: 

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/698944132/

I don't wanna update the game but maybe I will make Foolish sunday 2 in the future :)

HAVE FUN!
